channel.title: 2600k on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in 2600k on Silviu's Blog

item.title: Make sensors report temperature on slackware64-current with an Intel I7 2600k
item.description: For some reasons the required modules don’t get loaded. Add the following to /etc/rc.d/rc.modules right above the line reading ### Mouse support: ### by SV for i2600k temperature /sbin/modprobe coretemp /sbin/modprobe pkgtemp Now sensors report the temperatures.
